MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH32 postcode area of Longniddry, affecting a number of properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.33am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed this has been caused by 3rd party damage to our high voltage underground cable network near Southfield Farm. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.57am on the 5th of March 2021.
